typedef struct ColliderSensor ColliderSensor;

/* const part of ActorClass (ROM) */
typedef struct ColliderSensor_const {
	const char* instName;

	/* simple ports */
	const SendDataPort ColliderPort;
	const SendDataConjPort Colliderdata;

	/* data receive ports */

	/* saps */
	const PTimerConjPort timer;

	/* replicated ports */

	/* services */
} ColliderSensor_const;


/* constant for state machine data */
#define COLLIDERSENSOR_HISTORY_SIZE 2

/* variable part of ActorClass (RAM) */
struct ColliderSensor {
	const ColliderSensor_const* const constData;

	/* data send ports */

	/*--------------------- attributes ---------------------*/
	 char str[40]
	;
	 char temp_string[40]
	;
	 char send_string[40]
	;
	 char distance[40]
	;
	 char colliderNum[40]
	;
	 char sendstring[40]
	;


	/* state machine variables */
	etInt16 state;
	etInt16 history[COLLIDERSENSOR_HISTORY_SIZE];
};
